name: obduk C.M.S.
description: A Content Management System (CMS) written with Ruby on Rails

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The email address for the first admin account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Set to same as the Heroku App name (set automatically for review apps)

S3_BUCKET.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket

S3_HOST.description: The host of the Amazon S3 bucket or CloudFront endpoint for the bucket

S3_REGION.description: The region of the Amazon S3 bucket

HOST.description: The host for the first site (defaults to HEROKU_APP_NAME.herokuapp.com)

NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME.description: The name for the app on New Relic (defaults to HEROKU_APP_NAME)

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A randomly generated secret to verify sessions

BUNDLE_WITHOUT.description: Don't install asset gems on Heroku
